channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Paths Of Edith Stein: Fr. Mitch Pacwa?s Investigation
channel.desc: Journey with Fr. Pacwa to study the life of Jewish philosopher, turned Discalced Carmelite nun, Edith Stein, and how she found Christ, and make the ultimate sacrifice in Auschwitz. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Live
channel.desc: From the EWTN Studio in Rome, Fr. Wojciech Giertych joins Fr. Mitch to discuss the beginning of the life of grace. its connection to nature, and the effects it has on moral life. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! On The Road To Christ
channel.desc: Travel through beautiful New Mexico and Colorado with Bob Dolan, to explore the historic Loretto Chapel, Cathedral Basilica of St. Francis of Assisi, and the Mother Cabrini Shrine. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Life On The Rock
channel.desc: Fr. Mark and the Franciscan Friars of the Eternal Word are back. Interviews, spiritual insights from the friars, music videos and much more. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer answers viewer questions on a wide range of subjects, including: Reason, Faith, Suffering, Virtue, and the Existence of God. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Bulgarie, Des Racines Pour Les Roms
channel.desc: Les Tsiganes en Bulgarie sont l?un des plus grands groupes minoritaires. La plupart vivent dans la pauvret?, dans des baraques de fortune, priv?s d?eau courante et d??lectricit?, et luttent contre leur propre impuissance et contre les r?ticences que les Bulgares ont ? leur ?gard. Beaucoup ont perdu espoir pour l?avenir. C?est dans ce milieu que sont entr?s les P?res sal?siens. Comme l?explique le p?re Jaroslav Fogl : ? Nous avons choisi d?aider les Roms, car en tant que Sal?siens, nous sommes vou?s ? ces enfants et ces jeunes qui survivent en marge de la soci?t? et qui ont besoin d?aide ?. Voici l?histoire de l?impact extraordinaire des Sal?siens qui ont chang? des vies. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Divine Mercy
channel.desc: Fr. Daniel Klimek explains the purpose and effects of the Transfiguration. Paul Darrow also shares his story of abuse and a lifestyle he left after seeing Mother Angelica on TV. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: They Might Be Saints Fr. Aloysius Schwartz
channel.desc: Canonization candidate Fr. Al Schwartz dedicated his life to working with the poorest of the poor, establishing youth programs and founding religious orders that still serve his worldwide mission long after his death. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Sorrowful Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (18 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Most Precious Blood Of Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, as they recite this beautiful prayer in honor of the Precious Blood of Jesus shed for our salvation. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Called To Communion With Dr. David Anders
channel.desc: Dr. Anders answers questions about the Catholic Church requiring confession to priests, why Jesus called Mary his Mother, ?woman,? and why Catholics are not to use contraceptives. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Eucharist
channel.desc: Fr. Koch and young adults reflect on the Holy Sacrament as a mystery of faith. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: At each Mass, a wedding feast is taking place. Mother meditates on the parable, which our Lord compares to the kingdom of heaven. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Bishop Pierre Olivier Tremblay explains how a pig and a Rosary led to miraculous occurrences in Cap-de-la- Madeleine in Quebec, Canada. Part 2 of 3, hosted by Johnnette Williams. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Pro Life Weekly
channel.desc: Every week, Abigail Galv?n and a team of pro-life experts shine the light of truth on abortion, euthanasia, assisted suicide, and the culture of death. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Great Britain On Location
channel.desc: Fr. Armand de Malleray explains his mission to strengthen Catholic identity and bring Catholic families closer to the faith. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Enduring Legacy
channel.desc: AnnaMaria Cardinalli explores the rich history of the faith in New Mexico through music, art, and insightful interviews. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: John Dechiaro Presents: Peace
channel.desc: Enjoy the beautiful sounds of classical guitar, performed by John DeChiaro. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Life Is Worth Living
channel.desc: Archbishop Sheen says that at a time when man has more and more material conditions for happiness, he's multiplying wars. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Stations Of The Cross
channel.desc: Using St. Alphonsus Liguori's Prayers as a guide, pray the traditional Stations of the Cross aiding your meditation with live-action images from Christ's Passion. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Explore With The Miracle Hunter
channel.desc: "Miracle Hunter" Michael O'Neill takes a trip to the famed ruins of Pompeii, where he explores the life's work of Blessed Bartolo Longo. Known as the "Apostle of the Rosary,? he performed many miracles in his life. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: On The Road To Christ
channel.desc: Travel through beautiful New Mexico and Colorado with Bob Dolan, to explore the historic Loretto Chapel, Cathedral Basilica of St. Francis of Assisi, and the Mother Cabrini Shrine. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Global Divine Mercy Chaplet
channel.desc: Children from around the world pray the Chaplet of Divine Mercy. (30 minutes).
